Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29108 Microsoft SharePoint Server Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29108 Microsoft SharePoint Server Vulnerability
text: Microsoft SharePoint Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a flaw in the SharePoint Server component. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
